column4: guys, there is any way to easy change the internet configuration in ubuntu server ? If I remeber well, before was a graphic interface
editting /etc/network/interfaces ? using a web gui like ebox?
ubuntu server has no gui by default
it was something like midnight commander, 3-4 versions before
I have problem with the manual config for network
I tried automatically into a network and the internet is working
with manually settings is not working
a curses gui to configure network ?
yes....something to make the internet working with manuall settings :)
no; sorry. nevfer heard of such a thing. unless maybe wicd-ncurses?
no....:( maybe was other OS....anyway, do you have manual config in your PC ?
no i use network manager in desktop. but i do know how to edit /etc/network/interfaces
what do you want to configure?
can I go in pm with you ?
